question: Write a letter to the US embassy to change the date of your appointment
text: I am writing this email to seek your help to update our US Visa interview appointment dates.

I mistakenly rescheduled my previous appointment from 28th September 2023 to 1st February 2024. I am meaning to have an earlier schedule, so when I saw there is a slot in February, I immediately rescheduled it without noticing that the year was 2024 and not 2023. This was an oversight on my part.

I would really appreciate it if you can change my interview appointment to its original date of September 28, 2023. We are planning to have holidays in the US in December next year hence, rescheduling this will enable us to spend our time with our relatives during those important occasions.
I apologize for the inconvenience this might cause you. I hope you can consider this request and help us to resolve this matter.
